    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Linked Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=643) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 210 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[arcane bond](/Classes.aspx?ID=12); [arcane school](/Classes.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

You have linked your bonded item to the well of energy that powers your school spells. When you Drain your Bonded Item to cast a spell of your arcane school, you also regain 1 Focus Point.
